resources.string: Search Screen. It has an EditText at the top of the screen to search your desired music. Below that you will see an image of the album. It has a SeekBar above the media player buttons. It contains 3 buttons at the bottom of the screen play, skip next and skip previous.

Playlist Screen. This screen contains a list of song categories which represent the user\'s library of songs and also an Add Playlist for adding a new song category to your Playlist. By clicking any of the Playlist categories, the Playing activity opens an explicit intent and a chosen song is going to be played.

Radio Screen.\nIt will contain a Media Player that streams music from the Cloud services. Below you will see an image of the radio. At the bottom of the screen it has a SeekBar above the media player buttons. It contains 3 buttons at the bottom of the screen:play, skip next and skip previous.

This App will use Spotify API to search for online music by the Spotify website. On this screen it can be used an option to search in the Spotify. On this screen can be used to search in the Spotify library where the user can define specifications (songs, artists and albums).
